DOC.brief_summary: This program seek implement quality improvement program improve care Veterans TIA minor stroke 6 Veteran Health Administration Hospitals . The investigator evaluate implementation effectiveness quality improvement program .
DOC.brief_title: Protocol-guided Rapid Evaluation Veterans Experiencing New Transient Neurological Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Aim 1 . To develop quality improvement program improve care Veterans TIA minor stroke deployed nationwide . The program include multiple component : TIA/minor stroke telehealth disease management protocol enroll Veterans time presentation follow 90-days index TIA/minor stroke event ; staff training program review component guideline-concordant TIA/minor stroke care ; template use nurse pharmacy staff ; report system base validated electronic quality measure ( eCQMs ) allow staff monitor time-sensitive process care outcomes population Veterans TIA minor stroke . Lessons learn individual site engage quality improvement program share across site use web-based platform virtual collaborative . Aim 2 . To evaluate effectiveness Aim 1 QI intervention program Veterans TIA minor stroke usual care . Teams 6 intervention site give quality improvement program component . The primary effectiveness outcome proportion Veterans receive guideline-concordant process care eligible refer `` defect-free '' care rate . The secondary effectiveness outcome 90-day recurrent vascular event rate . Aim 3 . To evaluate implementation QI intervention program across 6 participate site . The implementation outcome : proportion eligible Veterans enrol telehealth ; participate clinician satisfaction quality improvement program ; participant assessment quality improvement program component include eCQM web-based platform term usability , complexity , relative advantage ; adaptability program course study . Aim 4 . To evaluate CFIR construct contextual factor associate successful suboptimal implementation new program Veterans acute medical problem require timely care . Secondary Aim To evaluate sustainability program . Sustainability evaluate one-year period begin immediately one-year active implementation period .
DOC.criteria: This program seek VA hospital selfdesignated either VHA Primary Stroke Center Limited Hours Stroke Facility Supporting Stroke Center . That > 25 stroke/TIA patient per year willing participate . Eligibility staff interview base involvement QI intervention willingness participate . Unwilling participate
